sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, Lock, Mail, Phone, MapPin, Calendar } from 'lucide-react'; interface BorrowerAuthProps { onLogin: (borrowerId: string, borrowerData: any) => void; } interface BorrowerData { id: string; name: string; email: string; phone: string; address: string; dateOfBirth: string; monthlyIncome: number; existingDebt: number; loanPurpose: string; requestedAmount: number; } const BorrowerAuth: React.FC = ({ onLogin }) => { const [isLogin, setIsLogin] = useState(true); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ email: '', password: '', name: '', phone: '', address: '', dateOfBirth: '', monthlyIncome: '', existingDebt: '', loanPurpose: 'business', requestedAmount: '' }); const handleSubmit = (e: React.FormEvent) => { e.preventDefault(); if (isLogin) { // Simulate login - in real app, this would call an API const borrowerId = formData.email.split('@')[0]; const mockBorrowerData: BorrowerData = { id: borrowerId, name: 'John Doe', email: formData.email, phone: '+91 9876543210', address: 'Mumbai, Maharashtra', dateOfBirth: '1990-01-15', monthlyIncome: 25000, existingDebt: 15000, loanPurpose: 'business', requestedAmount: 50000 }; onLogin(borrowerId, mockBorrowerData); } else { // Simulate signup const borrowerId = formData.email.split('@')[0]; const newBorrowerData: BorrowerData = { id: borrowerId, name: formData.name, email: formData.email, phone: formData.phone, address: formData.address, dateOfBirth: formData.dateOfBirth, monthlyIncome: parseInt(formData.monthlyIncome), existingDebt: parseInt(formData.existingDebt || '0'), loanPurpose: formData.loanPurpose, requestedAmount: parseInt(formData.requestedAmount) }; onLogin(borrowerId, newBorrowerData); } }; const handleInputChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; return (

{isLogin ? 'Borrower Login' : 'Apply for Loan'}

{isLogin ? 'Access your loan dashboard' : 'Start your loan application'}

{!isLogin && ( <>

Maximum: ₹1,25,000 (RBI Limit)

)}
{isLogin && (

Demo: Use any email to login and explore the borrower dashboard

)}
); }; export default BorrowerAuth;
